stories.text:
Several new and repurposed/old channels are operating large "live" streams with Twitter/Elon Musk style cryptocurrency scams. They shot straight to my recommendations, have disabled chat, and lots of views. They're using archived footage of Everyday Astronaut and SpaceX press conferences with overlays.

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCBnsjjrHaiQI0HHpffcqalg/about

https://www.youtube.com/user/studioimagetm/about

https://www.youtube.com/c/OMeditante/about

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCA4Su1Rvtclz3u4Qe-gbZyA/about

edits: clarifying traits such as channel age, content

stories.text: With Australia's new mass surveillance mandate, I'm in the market for a new email service provider. Who do you use to host your email?
stories.title: Ask HN: What email service provider are you using for your custom domain?
